## DefaultApp.registerStylesTarget() method

API for Application and Seed authors to define dynamic [AppStyle](./foundation-shell.appstyle.md) integration points.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerStylesTarget(targetId: any, predicate: any): AppStylesTargetBehavior;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  targetId | any | [AppTargetId](./foundation-shell.apptargetid.md). |
|  predicate | any | Optional [AppStylePredicate](./foundation-shell.appstylepredicate.md). |

**Returns:**

AppStylesTargetBehavior

A  that will stay in sync as styles are registered and deregistered.
